text:
Foodie is holding a giveaway, beginning on Monday March 25th, 12:00 am EST! Three contributors will be randomly chosen to receive a prize at the end of the current round.

The current round ends on:
March 27th, 2019 at 11:59 pm EST

Note: this giveaway is only available if you reside in Ontario, Canada and have reached the age of majority in Ontario.

You earn one raffle ticket for every 50 points you earn in this round (displayed in your profile). You can earn points by submitting dishes/restaurants and getting them approved (50 points for an approved dish, 50 points for an approved restaurant). You are automatically enrolled into the contest once you have a submission approved.

The reward for each winner is a $20 Amazon gift card (Canadian).

If youâ€™re a winner,
the rewards will be available in your profile for one week.

You can view this information again in the Announcements section on the top right of your profile.

More contest details here.
